plain t-shirt will emphasize the lines of the figure and sense of style.

title: Knitted shorts Staff tw black
description:
The free cut allows you to feel light and relaxed, and the drawstring belt will ensure an optimally comfortable fit. The model is complemented by three pockets without a fastener.

Material:
- 72% cotton, 23% polyester, 5% elastane.

Details and cut:
- straight loose cut;
- elastic waistband with a drawstring for a secure fit;
- three pockets: two slits on the sides and one patch open at the back;
- a tag with the brand logo sewn on the back pocket.

Season:
- summer.

Color:
- black.

Care:
- wash in normal mode at a temperature not higher than 30°C, without wringing;
- bleaching is prohibited;
- hang dry, without using artificial drying.

In the photo:
- height of the model - 180 cm;
- weight of the model - 78 kg;
- size of clothes - L.
sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL, XXL
